lines:
ih

depend upon your good 
quidaule Words can not 
liberale my feeling, and 
Jhope you will accept 
my heart lauks in 
Wire few lines. En closing 
gore a drap por five 
hundred dollars gold 
which I hope will be 
sufficient to defray my 
dous exfeuses actudie 
Tertion is for a few 
Imouths

Johan

Das war allt

At ad 
ad his Mat

A

da set to

Yours heat truly 
KY. Kewan
raw: ih depend upon your good quidaule Words can not liberale my feeling, and Jhope you will accept my heart lauks in Wire few lines. En closing gore a drap por five hundred dollars gold which I hope will be sufficient to defray my dous exfeuses actudie Tertion is for a few Imouths Johan Das war allt At ad ad his Mat A da set to Yours heat truly KY. Kewan

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter stating that while they had a pleasant Christmas, they request $10 each to cover expenses through the holidays.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
